articles.author: Helen Regan
articles.title: How a cocktail of rogue storms and climate chaos unleashed deadly flooding across Asia - CNN
articles.description: Looking at the weather map on his computer and seeing three simultaneous tropical storms forming across Asia in late November, climatologist Fredolin Tangang’s first thoughts drifted to the 2004 disaster movie “The Day After Tomorrow.”
